Sentencas: In this article, it was investigated whether potentially low-cost CO2 capture from SOFC systems could enhance the penetration of SOFC in the energy market in a highly carbon-constrained society in the mid-term future (up to year 2025).
Titulo: Competitiveness of CO2 capture from an industrial solid oxide fuel cell combined heat and power system in the early stage of market introduction

Sentencas: The application of 5 MWe SOFC systems for industrial combined heat and power (CHP) generation was considered.
Titulo: Competitiveness of CO2 capture from an industrial solid oxide fuel cell combined heat and power system in the early stage of market introduction

Sentencas: For CO2 capture, oxyfuel combustion of anode off-gas using commercially available technologies was selected.
Titulo: Competitiveness of CO2 capture from an industrial solid oxide fuel cell combined heat and power system in the early stage of market introduction

Sentencas: Gas turbine (GT-) CHP plant was considered to be the reference case.
Titulo: Competitiveness of CO2 capture from an industrial solid oxide fuel cell combined heat and power system in the early stage of market introduction

Sentencas: Technical results showed that despite the energy penalties due to CO2 capture and compression, net electrical and heat efficiencies were nearly identical with or without CO2 capture.
Titulo: Competitiveness of CO2 capture from an industrial solid oxide fuel cell combined heat and power system in the early stage of market introduction

Sentencas: This was due to higher heat recovery efficiency by separating SOFC off-gas streams for CO2 capture.
Titulo: Competitiveness of CO2 capture from an industrial solid oxide fuel cell combined heat and power system in the early stage of market introduction

Sentencas: However, CO2 capture significantly increased the required SOFC and heat exchanger areas.
Titulo: Competitiveness of CO2 capture from an industrial solid oxide fuel cell combined heat and power system in the early stage of market introduction

Sentencas: Economic results showed that for above 40-50 $ t (1) CO2 price, SOFC-CHP systems were more economical when equipped with CO2 capture.
Titulo: Competitiveness of CO2 capture from an industrial solid oxide fuel cell combined heat and power system in the early stage of market introduction

Sentencas: CO2 capture also enabled SOFC-CHP to compete with GT-CHP at higher cell stack production costs.
Titulo: Competitiveness of CO2 capture from an industrial solid oxide fuel cell combined heat and power system in the early stage of market introduction

Sentencas: At zero CO2 price, cell stack production cost had to be as low as 140 kW (1) for SOFC-CHP to outperform GT-CHP.
Titulo: Competitiveness of CO2 capture from an industrial solid oxide fuel cell combined heat and power system in the early stage of market introduction

Sentencas: At 100 $ t (1) CO2 price, the cell stack production cost requirement raised to 350 $ kW (1).
Titulo: Competitiveness of CO2 capture from an industrial solid oxide fuel cell combined heat and power system in the early stage of market introduction

Sentencas: With CO2 capture, SOFC-CHP still outperformed GT-CHP at a significantly higher cell stack production cost above 900 $ kW (1).
Titulo: Competitiveness of CO2 capture from an industrial solid oxide fuel cell combined heat and power system in the early stage of market introduction
